title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Turn on your grace and sense of glamor to wow potential clients, partners, or followers. Familiarity breeds contempt. But nothing spirits others away into another world like sporting a style from a bygone era or exotic place. Perhaps theres some use for that vintage jacket waiting in the wings of your wardrobe for its day in the Sun. Bend expectations of your own and surprise the world with your originality. Fashion designer Wolfgang Joop said, Fashion is about suspense and surprise and fantasy. Its not about rules. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
